mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.question as content, q.create_time as created_at, f.feedback, f.bad_reason FROM question_history q LEFT JOIN data_feedback f ON q.id = f.history_id ORDER BY q.create_time DESC

SELECT q.answer FROM question_history q LEFT JOIN data_feedback f ON q.id = f.history_id WHERE q.question = #{q} AND (f.feedback != 'bad' OR f.feedback IS NULL) AND q.create_time > NOW() - INTERVAL #{hour} HOUR ORDER BY q.create_time DESC LIMIT 1
